website_summaries.verdict: 12-pack of reusable stainless-steel oyster shells for cooking and serving oysters.
pros: Made of 26-gauge stainless steel, oven and dishwasher safe
Large to accommodate all size oysters, flat bottom, and deep enough to retain juices or added sauces
Versatile pans can also be used to cook other meats, veggies, etc
or even to bake desserts or biscuits
Use on grill or in oven
Oven and dishwasher safe, Lifetime Warranty from manufacturer
cons: A few purchasers found the shells to be difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Closet thing to being at Acme oyster house.
customer_reviews.text: If you cook and like oysters you must have these. I have reordered twice to get three sets since everytime I use these, the oysters get eaten faster than I can product them. Great product and recipe that is included. Though I was in New Orleans when I tasted the oysters that were cooked in these.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Holt

customer_reviews.title: but look like they will be great to hold all the sauces ...
customer_reviews.text: haven't had a chance to use yet, but look like they will be great to hold all the sauces and juices without tipping over. We had been using rock salt to steady the real shells. It also looks like we may be able to put the real shells inside these steel ones. Haven't tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Drago's Type Grilled Oysters
customer_reviews.text: Fairly sturdy and great for grilled oysters, like Drago's. Need the recipe? [...] no gimmicks, no advertising, no cookies, just recipes, blues and family fun travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Daulong

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a set about a year ago and just ordered more for the Florida condo. Love it for Oysters Florentine.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G. V

customer_reviews.title: Oyster shells
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We use them a lot. We usually get bushel of oysters a a time and freeze them so when we want some baked oysters these are perfect. You can fit 2-3 oysters on a shell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Cleaned up quick. Sharp edges cut a finger in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: C. G.

customer_reviews.title: It's a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I love them and my friends also love when I use them. I just don't have quiet enough of them yet. I have 3 packs but need more.
customer_reviews.author: Genacajun

customer_reviews.title: Price for the product was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The storing of them were my favorite feature. The cleaning part was not as I’d like. Seems they should come with a type of non stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Man Nic

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect. I'm glad I purchased them
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. I'm glad I purchased them! Thank you so much Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Hameyo

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Revived as a gift & Absolutely love them. I’ve done oysters, shrimp mirliton casserole, just to name a few. Easy to clean, store and use.
customer_reviews.author: WHO DAT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Shells are great for Shrimp, Scallops, Lobster bites, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Arias

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love our shells so much that we ordered a Second set! Can now grill 2 dozen at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Woods

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive but work really well. Difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but work really well. Difficult to get oysters in the shell where we live so stock the freezer in the fall with shucked oysters and can grill anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer kate h.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shells worked great. I have charbroiled over 4 dozen oysters to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them though I did find them to be a bit over priced at bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, cooks great on grill or oven
customer_reviews.text: They work great in the oven or on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Motherof2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome!! best purchase ever, spray with olive oil and clean up is a breeze!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to work with, Shells held an ample amount of oysters .
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Look great for serving as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Look great for serving as well as clean up nicely after. Just spray cooking spray before using.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerita Willett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, was impressed by the quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: debora burke

customer_reviews.title: Shells were great!
customer_reviews.text: Shells work well! We used in the oven. Saves messing with real shells. Easy to clean and store .
customer_reviews.author: Marian L. Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: Grill seafood, then you need these
customer_reviews.text: Love the flat bottoms. Can use on grill or oven. Nice heavy weight. Have used for stuffed peppers, shrimp, oysters, fish and chicken. If used on grill, can get smoked flavor without over charring.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Noah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything stuck horribly bad and was a nightmare to clean. I’ll probably never use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Creel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after attending the oyster festival in new Orleans last month. the Charbroiled oysters we made with these taste every bit as good as the ones we had there.
customer_reviews.author: mikelab

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these worked okay then I found the cast iron grill pan for oysters.
customer_reviews.author: shedra

customer_reviews.title: Have not used the shells yet but have much interest ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the shells yet but have much interest in them. Will bake soon and more information to come!
customer_reviews.author: meemeeG

customer_reviews.title: Picture of this product is false advertising.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I had the same impression when we opened the package. $36.00 for these? The picture in the ad was drastically different than the actual. I would recommend that you pass this one by. We are sending this one back.
customer_reviews.author: larrys32545

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried them yet but they made real good
customer_reviews.author: robert scott

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and large enough to make any receipe you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Shells were exactly what I was looking for. Reusable, sturdy and large enough to make any receipe you can imagine. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if a little larger-Large Oysters fill to the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if a little larger-Large Oysters fill to the top and boil over, medium and small do fine. Was easy clean-up, lot better than cleaning shells! Little pricey, but still work well for u Oyster Lovers-Room to spoon on peppers, onions, sauce, etc-Easy for presentation and nice to have twelve little dishes--I use wax paper inbetween to separate easily. Only recommendation to manufacture-Make a little bigger or offer the larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use to Cook Oysters or Shrimp
customer_reviews.text: I like these stainless steel shells to cook oysters in. You don't mess with the dirty natural shells wondering if you got them "clean enough." Works good for shrimp too. Don't believe them when they tell you that all you do is put them in the dishwasher. Ain't so! You need to soak them in soapy water after use, use a Brillo pad on them to clean off cooked on food, then you can put them in the dishwasher. I have three dozen of the shells and I may order another two dozen of these.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Dog

customer_reviews.title: Prefer this than actually shucking oysters.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make chargrilled oysters in the oven. I had wanted to purchase the ceramic shells, but just couldn’t justify the cost of those. These worked out very well. I wish they were a little smaller, but it worked just fine by putting two oysters per shell. They cleaned up very easily in the dishwasher. I did spray them with a little canola oil before adding the oysters and cheeses.
customer_reviews.author: loriltx

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Grilled Oysters
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love,LOVE these! We also bought the outset 76225 and tried a dozen grilled Rockefeller in each. These stainless steel shells were AMAZING!! I bought two more sets. We will never use the outset pan after the way these shells grill. If you spray with Pam before grilling and clean the immediately after eating your oysters, they are super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Natw16

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilled shucked oysters
customer_reviews.text: We don't find shelled oysters often, so these little gems a awesome for grilling shucked oysters on the grill. Add the moist morsels and dab of liquid of your choice and place on the grill. A grill mat works well also with SS oyster shells.
customer_reviews.author: kirk nafsinger

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.text: Char-Grilled oysters!!!! Nuff said. Easy to clean, easy to store away. Wish the price was cheaper, but since these are steel and not aluminum, they are worth it. Should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: William Fox

customer_reviews.title: These shells are a hit
customer_reviews.text: I actually brought this item roughly about a year ago and I am STILL excited to use them. My Oyster Rockefeller recipe worked perfectly with great raving reviews from family. The only problem is...now when some family members come by they want me to make them. Dang on blessing and a curse at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling
customer_reviews.text: Will order again- perfect for grilling. New Orleans style !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those pasteurized fresh oysters in the grocery. Great for oysters Rockefeller or just plain baked with a little butter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the oysters!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great quality product... I was totally surprise .... Can't wait for the grill be on and seafood served on these ..
customer_reviews.author: Clara A.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for our oyster bar-b-q's. In fact I'm planning on ordering another set for when we have company
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Buy your oysters already cleaned and shucked, use your recipe and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: huthuthut

customer_reviews.title: Not for oysters rockefeller
customer_reviews.text: Too large and not deep enough. I like my oysters raw but used these to bake. Their opening is shallow
customer_reviews.author: Baja Reader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You need these - even if you don't know why. The day you need them, you will thank me!
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, so easy to use and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: WDH

customer_reviews.title: Well made just hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean and they just stick Even when spray not for us
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Hold a good quantity of oysters or other seafood plus whatever additions the recipe calls for. Are very easy to clean. Also look nice. Are pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great and unusual item
customer_reviews.text: Great product - - my wife come up with some great things with these reusable shells.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Recipe is great. Would give 5 stars but it's a pain to wash.
customer_reviews.author: HTran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, would suggest you spray with pam to make easier to clean after cooking with
customer_reviews.author: Adria C Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Loved these for the grill
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for the grill. I wrapped them in foil so easy clean up, wished they had some a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just so-so
customer_reviews.text: Despite the claim of easy cleanability by the seller, even after soaking and a run thru the dishwasher, they weren't clean. They weren't a good value for the money and were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product ans quick shipment. a little high in price but it is stainless steel. Will see how long they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Best Oysters
customer_reviews.text: They worked great! Shipped in a timely manner. I would suggest small oysters, the medium oysters are almost to big. Use a old cookie sheet pan, much easier to remove from grill.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ingels

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these along with the cast iron oyster grill pan after reading some of the answered questions. One person said that these would probably fit into the cast iron pan. They don't. I was hoping to use these instead of buying the oysters in the shells since we don't own an oyster knife and glove. I decided to keep them and use them for serving the oysters roasted in the grill pan. Even though I am somewhat disappointed that I won't be able to use these as a shell replacement, I think they will come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They came with scratches, we have not tried them on the grill yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found something better to use on the grill without using the oyster shells.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: SOS shells are great and fairly easy to clean if you spray them ...
customer_reviews.text: SOS shells are great and fairly easy to clean if you spray them first with oil! If you happen to forget the shells on the grill like a friend of mind did and totally burn everything and get get them perfectly clean by normal cleaning, just simply get a small metal wire brush that fits on a drill and restore the shells to like new. Had to do it once and looked like new! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Gele

customer_reviews.title: These things are a Great Product...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shells. I normally buy whole raw Oysters, but with shipping for 100 Oysters being almost as much as the Oysters, cost was a consideration. This year I bought a Gallon of Shucked Select Chesapeake Pride from our local Grocery Store and had to pay no shipping we got over 200 large Oysters in the gallon. We have eaten Oysters over the Holiday every way you can think of, but the way I like best is to just spoon a couple big ones on each shell, dress with your favorite condiments and slurp away, no shell fragments, no sand, no algae. These are a great product...
customer_reviews.author: Ragnaar

customer_reviews.title: Big shell for a little oyster.
customer_reviews.text: These are 5 star shells, but they are way too big. You can make a small meatloaf in them. We bought two sets and ended up putting two or three oysters in each shell with spinach mix for Oysters Rockefeller.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick E. Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to use and clean up is easy. I spray each with a small amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to use and clean up is easy. I spray each with a small amount of non-stick cooking spray before putting a shucked oyster on it. I drop a dab of oyster butter on it and some thawed chopped spinach & parmesan. Put it on the grill and in a few minutes - excellence!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hanold

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to count your "shells"
customer_reviews.text: I would give this an excellent 5 stars for quality, but I found, when I actually went to use the "shells" on the day of my dinner party, that I had been sent only 11, NOT 12. I needed 12, and I ended up not using the product. I would ask for a replacement, but Amazon says I am too late for that. I still think the stainless steel shells are nice and I definitely will use them when I don't need 12 matching pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Famed Girl Archaeologist

product_meta.title: Oyster Shells Stainless Steel Reusable
product_meta.description: "NEW ORLEANS CAJUN COOKWARE" The “char-grilled oysters” served in New Orleans became a national success. Serving char-grilled oysters on their natural shell was a bit of a problem. The labor of finding and opening natural oysters, sanitizing the shells, consistency of the shells and disposal of the used shells forced us to seek a better and more efficient way of grilling. As a result we began making our own stainless steel shells for use in our restaurant as well as for home use. The result is a large, flat bottom, stainless steel shell that is sanitary, deep enough for your “special” sauce, allows char-grilling of a variety of foods and is easily cleaned and reused. Now anything from pre-opened oysters, to chicken to veggies, etc. can be char-grilled or oven-cooked at home with your own “special sauce”. You are limited only by your imagination! (12 shells per pack)
feature_bullets: Used for Char Grilling, Baking, Broiling, Cold Desserts
26 gauge Stainless Steel, Oven & Dishwasher Safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars120 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
